snippet.title: Codename: Terranova - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Codename: Terranova is out now! Buy the game on Steam:
https://bit.ly/3bmfl7y

Codename Terranova is a co-op communication game.
The games put the players the Agent / Operations Center roles (as in action and spy movies)

Two players must cooperate to face tests that will become more and more difficult. The agent is on the Terranova experimental hovering train, where he has to perform security procedures and solve problems, while the Operator can remotely activate systems and support the agent by indicating procedures and dangers.

Your team will have to show that they are a perfect match to overcome any adversity. 
Everyone is invited to try, but few are destined to success.

Will you be among them?
